name: Tabanero - Patriarch - Torpedo Box Press
additionalNotes: This flavorful Medium blend starts off with rich tobacco flavors having notes of cedar and a spicy finish that lingers on the palette. Blended with the Oscuro Ecuadorian Havano 2000 Sun- grown wrapper evolves into a creamy complex smoke with notes of leather and toast through the second and final third of the cigar..You will experience fresh tobacco flavors and a cool draw from start to finish right down to the nub. This cigar is firm and packed full with fresh flavorful tobacco that fills the air with a pleasing aroma.
